cards.title: Charts
cards.description: Utilising histograms, pie charts, and scatter plots, visualise your listening patterns, encompassing your most recent favourite artists, genres, and tracks.

cards.title: Tables
cards.description: For a comprehensive experience, examine your insights in a structured tabular format, presenting a detailed breakdown of your musical preferences.

cards.title: Indexes
cards.description: View index scores  that elucidate facets such as danceability, energy levels, and mood, allowing for a nuanced understanding of your unique music persona.
